pages.text: $(bgreen)Jalapeno$() is not going to explode, not this time. But soon. Oh, so soon. It's close. He can feel it, his whole life's been leading up to this moment.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)175$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)instant-kill$() plant, which will spawn $(bred)20 blocks cross flame$() damage all enemies in this area after planted.
$(bpurple)Special :$() It can $(l)clear snow in that area and 10 blocks around$().It can even destroy all $(baqua)Ice Balls$() in 40 blocks$().$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() Not Available.
